Title: [L19] Unnecessary empty constructors defined
Content:
The [`Flipper` contract](https://github.com/OriginProtocol/origin-dollar/blob/bf4ff28d5944ecc277e66294fd2c702fee5cd58b/contracts/contracts/flipper/Flipper.sol#L28) defines empty constructors with no parameters, which is not necessary and only hinders code readability. According to the [Solidity docs on constructors](https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.5.11/contracts.html#constructors): “If there is no constructor, the contract will assume the default constructor, which is equivalent to `constructor() public {}`“.


To favor simplicity, consider removing all empty constructors from the codebase.


**Update:** *Fixed in [PR#646](https://github.com/OriginProtocol/origin-dollar/pull/646).*
